About.title: About Simple Portfolio App
About.subtitle: A production-grade portfolio management application
About.description: Simple Portfolio App is a financial portfolio management system that allows you to create and manage investment portfolios, track assets (stocks, crypto, etc.), and monitor your investment performance.
About.features_subtitle: Everything you need to manage your investments effectively.
About.feature_portfolios_desc: Create and manage multiple investment portfolios with ease.
About.feature_assets_desc: Track and manage your assets across different markets.
About.feature_multi_currency_desc: Support for multiple currencies with USD as base.
About.feature_responsive_desc: Works seamlessly on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
About.feature_auth_desc: JWT-based authentication to keep your data safe.
About.feature_i18n_desc: Available in English and French, with more to come.
About.tech_subtitle: A robust stack for a reliable application.
About.tech_frontend_desc: Next.js (App Router) with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui and TanStack Query
About.tech_infra_desc: PostgreSQL, Docker, CI/CD with GitHub Actions, deployed on Kubernetes
About.opensource_desc: This project is open source under the MIT License. Check out the source code and contribute on GitHub.
About.author_desc: Full-stack developer passionate about building production-grade applications.
